titleStmt.title: A Most serious expostulation with several of my fellow-citizens in reference to their standing so high for the D.Y.'s interest at this juncture of time

notesStmt.note: The D.Y.'s in title refers to the Duke of York. Cf. BM.
This item appears at reel 443:17 as Wing Y1 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1730:7 as Wing M2919A.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Harvard University Library.
